Package fr.sorbonne_u.components

Interface ComponentI.ComponentTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComposedContinuationI<ParameterType>, ContinuationI<ParameterType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent.AbstractTask, AbstractContinuation, AbstractLocalComposedContinuation, AbstractLocalContinuation, AbstractRemoteContinuation, ValueConsumer.ComputeAndThenPrintContinuation, ValueConsumer.ComputeAndThenPrintFinalContinuation
    Enclosing interface:
    ComponentI
    public static interface ComponentI.ComponentTask
extends java.lang.Runnable
    The interface ComponentTask is meant to group under a same interface all of the tasks for this component.

    Description

    As the Java Executor framework use Callable and Runnable, this interface is meant to be used to implement the runnable tasks of this component.

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2012-06-12

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ComponentI getTaskOwner()
      return the reference to the component owner of the executor service that will execute this task.
      java.lang.Object getTaskProviderReference()
      return the reference to the component owner or its plug-in that will execute this task.
      void setOwnerReference​(ComponentI owner)
      sets a reference to the owner component that can be used in the code of the task to access its services.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

    • Method Detail

      • setOwnerReference

        void setOwnerReference​(ComponentI owner)
        sets a reference to the owner component that can be used in the code of the task to access its services.

        Contract

         pre    owner != null
 pre    owner instanceof AbstractComponent
 post   true    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        owner - the component owner of the executor service that will execute this task.
